resources.string: Please wait while your image is encrypted
There was an error during encryption
The application ran out of memory
The original file was not deleted, but the encrypted file was still saved. YOUR PICTURE IS STILL ACCESSIBLE IN UNENCRYPTED FORM
Please wait while your image is decrypted
There was an error during decryption
The encrypted file was not deleted, but the decrypted file was still saved
Are you sure you want to encrypt the image %s ?
